name: Asteroid Alpha
description:
This is my 2DShooter Project.

Modifications:

  1. Created level 3 which is more difficult and is different from other levels
  2. Added boss to level 3 that has a larger size, more health, increased fire rate, more guns, and a different color than other enemies
  3. Added destroyable terrain to level 3 and changed the color of the terrain to make it visibly evident that it is destroyable
  4. Modified all levels, including levels 1 and 2 to make the game more challenging and make a clear progression in difficulty as you get further into the game
  5. Added a background to the main menu as well as instructions under the instructions tab
  6. Changed player's rate of fire on later levels, effectively increasing the time to destroy enemies as well as lowering the invincibility time after the death
  7. Changed terrain of level 3, adding more obstacles making it harder to traverse
  8. Added different backgrounds and music to each level
